234  template <typename ALLOC = std::allocator<char>>
235  string<RebindAlloc<ALLOC, char>> readString(const ALLOC& alloc = ALLOC())
236  {
237  string<RebindAlloc<ALLOC, char>> value{alloc};
238  const size_t len = static_cast<size_t>(readVarSize());
239  value.reserve(len);
240  for (size_t i = 0; i < len; ++i)
241  {
242  value.push_back(static_cast<char>(readChar()));
243  }
244  return value;
245  }
246 
252  bool readBool();
253 
259  template <typename ALLOC = std::allocator<uint8_t>>
260  BasicBitBuffer<RebindAlloc<ALLOC, uint8_t>> readBitBuffer(const ALLOC& allocator = ALLOC())
261  {
262  const size_t bitSize = static_cast<size_t>(readVarSize());
263  size_t numBytesToRead = bitSize / 8;
264  const uint8_t numRestBits = static_cast<uint8_t>(bitSize - numBytesToRead * 8);
265  BasicBitBuffer<RebindAlloc<ALLOC, uint8_t>> bitBuffer(bitSize, allocator);
266  uint8_t* buffer = bitBuffer.getBuffer();
267  const BitPosType beginBitPosition = getBitPosition();
268  if ((beginBitPosition & 0x07) != 0)
269  {
270  // we are not aligned to byte
271  while (numBytesToRead > 0)
272  {
273  *buffer = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBits(8));
274  buffer++;
275  numBytesToRead--;
276  }
277  }
278  else
279  {
280  // we are aligned to byte
281  setBitPosition(beginBitPosition + numBytesToRead * 8);
282  memcpy(buffer, m_context.buffer + beginBitPosition / 8, numBytesToRead);
283  buffer += numBytesToRead;
284  }
285 
286  if (numRestBits > 0)
287  *buffer = static_cast<uint8_t>(readBits(numRestBits) << (8 - numRestBits));
288 
289  return bitBuffer;
290  }
291 
297  BitPosType getBitPosition() const { return m_context.bitIndex; }
298 
304  void setBitPosition(BitPosType pos);
305 
311  void alignTo(size_t alignment);
312 
318  size_t getBufferBitSize() const { return m_context.bufferBitSize; }
319 
320 private:
321  uint8_t readChar();
322 
323  ReaderContext m_context;
324 };
